component.feedback: ***You must enter the exact and full command.***
component.existingcommands: Enter the command to filter the show running-config output for the 'line con' section.

command.instruction: Enter the command to filter for 'down' interfaces in the brief listing.

command.correctresponse: show ip interface brief | include down
command.deviceresponse:
Interface IP-Address OK? Method Status Protocol
Embedded-Service-Engine0/0 unassigned YES unset administratively down down
Serial0/0/1 unassigned YES unset administratively down down
command.instruction: Enter the command to exclude 'up' interfaces in the brief listing.

command.correctresponse: show ip interface brief | exclude up
command.deviceresponse:
Interface IP-Address OK? Method Status Protocol
Embedded-Service-Engine0/0 unassigned YES unset administratively down down
Serial0/0/1 unassigned YES unset administratively down down
command.instruction: Enter the command to filter the show running-config output to begin at the word 'line'.

command.deviceresponse:
line con 0
password 7 110A1016141D
login
line aux 0
line 2
no activation-character
no exec
transport preferred none
transport input all
transport output pad telnet rlogin lapb-ta mop udptn v120
ssh
stopbits 1
line vty 0 4
password 7 030752180500
login
transport input all
!
scheduler allocate 20000 1000
!
end

R1#
command.instruction: You successfully executed the filtered show commands.
